name: Aire
description:
Aire is a personal game project of mine for those who love playing simply to move around in a 3D environment. Fly around as a dragon and just have fun with it!

This project was originally intended as a school project, but I've decided to expand upon it. I hope to add more movement modes (e.g. climbing, swimming) among many other things (e.g. combat, better UI, better onboarding), so stay tuned for more updates!

This project was made in UE4, and all current 3D assets are from the UE4 store. But for the most part, this was my work.

Check out some music that I'm making for the game! https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Alqo_FqEXimQpQHkFgzV-wuLTrfRQ0Wb?usp=sha...

Feedback is absolutely appreciated. Thank you for your time and have a great day!!
